text: Charlotte Lee, Countess of Lichfield (5 September 1664 â€“ 17 February 1718), who was first called Lady Charlotte Fitzroy, was the illegitimate daughter of King Charles II of England. Charlotte was married at age 12 to her husband, Edward Henry Lee, 1st Earl of Lichfield, with whom she had a large family. title: Charlotte Lee, Countess of Lichfield
